RTCDTMFSender.summary: The RTCDTMFSender interface provides a mechanism for transmitting DTMF codes on a WebRTC . You gain access to the connection's RTCDTMFSender through the property on the audio track you wish to send DTMF with.

remarks.para: The primary purpose for WebRTC's DTMF support is to allow WebRTC-based communication clients to be connected to a public-switched telephone network (PSTN) or other legacy telephone service, including extant voice over IP (VoIP) services. For that reason, DTMF can't be used between two WebRTC-based devices, because there is no mechanism provided by WebRTC for receiving DTMF codes.

RTCDTMFSenderInsertDTMF.summary: The insertDTMF() method of the interface sends {{Glossary("DTMF")}} tones to the remote peer over the .

remarks.para: Tones are sent asynchronously. Every time a tone starts or ends, a tonechange event is sent to the RTCDTMFSender.

You can call insertDTMF() at any time while the connection is active. Each call to insertDTMF() replaces any pending tones in the toneBuffer.
You can abort sending queued tones by specifying an empty string ("") as the set of tones to play.
Since insertDTMF() replaces the tone buffer, in order to add to the DTMF tones being played, it is necessary to call insertDTMF() with a string containing both the remaining tones (stored in the toneBuffer) and the new tones appended together.

RTCDTMFSenderToneBuffer.summary:
The interface's toneBuffer property returns a string
containing a list of the DTMF tones currently queued for sending to the
remote peer over the . To place tones into the buffer,
call .

remarks.para: Tones are removed from the string as they're played, so only upcoming tones are listed.

RTCDTMFSenderToneBuffer.value:
A string listing the tones to be played. If the string is empty,
there are no tones pending.

RTCDTMFSenderCanInsertDTMF.summary: The canInsertDTMF read-only property of the interface returns a boolean value which indicates whether the RTCDTMFSender is capable of sending DTMF tones over the .
RTCDTMFSenderCanInsertDTMF.value: A boolean value which is true if the RTCDTMFSender is capable of sending DTMF tones, or false if it is not.

RTCDTMFSenderTonechange.summary: The tonechange event is sent to an by the WebRTC API to indicate when {{Glossary("DTMF")}} tones previously queued for sending (by calling ) begin and end.

remarks.para: To determine what tone started playing, or if a tone stopped playing, check the value of the event's property.
This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
